card_text: 2 Level 3 monsters$NYou can detach 1 material from this card; add 1 "Gold Pride" Spell from your Deck to your hand, then if your LP are lower than your opponent's, you can send 1 "Gold Pride" monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use the previous effect of "Gold Pride - Chariot Carrie" once per turn. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if the previous effect was activated this turn: Return this card to the Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Gold Pride - Captain Carrie" from your Deck or GY.
